where.trim:
cc.del_flg = 0 and
cc.vin = #{vin} and
cc.plate_no = #{plateNo} and
mcs.car_series_name = #{carSeriesName} and
mcm.car_model_name = #{carModelName} and
cc.purchase_date >= #{purchaseDateStart} and
cc.purchase_date < #{purchaseDateEnd} and
c.customer_name like CONCAT('%',#{customerName},'%') and
c.phone = #{phone} and
c.moofun_id like CONCAT('%',#{moofunId},'%') and
c.id_no = #{idNo} and

mapper.select:
SELECT cc.id, cc.vin, c.customer_id, c.customer_name, c.phone, cc.plate_no, '' sales_services_service, mcs.car_series_name, mcm.car_model_code, mcm.car_model_name, cc.purchase_date, mcl.color_name, c.moofun_id, c.id_no FROM t_customer_car cc INNER JOIN t_customer c ON cc.customer_id = c.customer_id INNER JOIN m_car mc ON cc.car_id = mc.car_id INNER JOIN m_car_series mcs ON mc.car_series_id = mcs.car_series_id INNER JOIN m_car_model mcm ON mc.car_model_id = mcm.car_model_id INNER JOIN m_color mcl ON cc.car_color_id = mcl.color_id
limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select count(1) from t_customer_car cc INNER JOIN t_customer c ON cc.customer_id = c.customer_id INNER JOIN m_car mc ON cc.car_id = mc.car_id INNER JOIN m_car_series mcs ON mc.car_series_id = mcs.car_series_id INNER JOIN m_car_model mcm ON mc.car_model_id = mcm.car_model_id
